issue.title: [C++] CMake target names differ from upstream provided names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7929](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7929). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Configuring a build tree with the flag ```sh
-DCMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG=ON
``` fails, because some of the targets exposed from the provided Find\* modules differ from the upstream names.
Namely this is the case for the targets of GTest, GLog and Thrift.
